title: Leaver buster for league client
body:
I was recently play Ascension and i went to queue. i was in champ select when it went to go patch or fix something. i was fine with this because i usually got it like once a week. But today it decided to give a leaver buster for the game updating. went back into the game and lost. but i was use to it not giving me leaver buster for the client being fixed. i had no control over whether or whether not i got a updated please fix riot and remove my afk leaver buster .

Thank you SmokeeyYT

replies.body: It's strange to hear that your client was patching in the middle of champion select, I've not heard of that happening before.  If you disconnected while loading, though, then it could be possible that your client had an update while restarting.  I recommend running through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot whatever failed to get you to the game server.  Even if it wasn't intentional, the system is going to treat all leaves equally.  I hope that helps!
